name: On Arrival Permit/Authorization
description: No visa required but you might need to get a permit upon arrival.

name: Electronic Visa
description: You can obtain the visa online before travelling.

name: On Arrival Visa
description: You can get the visa at the immigration upon arrival.

name: Electronic/Visa On Arrival
description: You can obtain the visa online or upon arrival.

name: Visa Required
description: You need a physical visa on your passport before arriving at the destination country. This is usually obtained from an authorised travel agent or from the destination country's embassy.

name: Electronic Permit/Authorization
description: No visa required but you might need to get a permit online.
